song.title: Take My Hand
song.info:
2nd place in pc demo compo at The gathering 2002
Lyrics: Take my hand and lead me to a place I can be free Understand this love is meant to be for you and me Can't you see the lost souls reaching far beyond the limits that we see When you reach for this
Take my hand and lead me to a place I have not been Understand I want to see some things I've never seen Can't you see the lost souls reaching far beyond the limits that we see When you take my hand in yours
